pages.text: $(li)Glowstone Dust is an essencial ingredient to brew Potions.$(br)$(li)This item can be used to upgrade regular potions to Level II in a $(l:patchouli:utility/vanilla/brewing_stand)$(l:patchouli:utility/vanilla/brewing_stand)Brewing Stand$(/l)$(/l).$(br)$(li)$(l:patchouli:illagers/witch)Witches$(/l) rarely drop this item upon death.

$(br)$(li)You can obtain Glowstone Dust breaking $(l:patchouli:utility/vanilla/glowstone_block)Glowstone Blocks$(/l) too.$(br)$(li)This item can be used to craft multiple items in a $(l:patchouli:utility/vanilla/crafting_table)Crafting Table$(/l).
